title: Hour 2: Tantalizing Tandem
description:
Stephen A. Smith and Chris Russo react to 20 of the 24 lawsuits filed against Deshaun Watson being settled. Stick around to listen to Chris' list of the top five QB/TE tandem in NFL history. P.K Subban joins the show to debate if hockey gets the appreciation it deserves and if the Lightning will tie the series tonight. JJ Redick stops by to discuss if there are any issues with Charles Barkley's comments on Kevin Durant.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Who is the best QB/TE tandem in NFL history?
